titleNepali: SEE २०८१ अनिवार्य गणित अभ्यास परीक्षा ४ (७५ पूर्णाङ्क)

context.Nepali: एउटा कक्षाका ६० जना विद्यार्थीहरूमा गरिएको सर्वेक्षणमा, ३५ जनाले फुटबल मन पराउँछन्, २५ जनाले भलिबल मन पराउँछन् र १० जनाले दुवै खेल मन पराउँछन् ।
context.English: In a survey of 60 students in a class, 35 like football, 25 like volleyball, and 10 like both games.

sub_questions.questionNepali: यदि फुटबल मन पराउने समूहलाई F र भलिबल मन पराउने समूहलाई V ले जनाउँछ भने, $n(F \cup V)$ को मान कति हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: If F denotes the set of students who like football and V denotes the set who like volleyball, what is the value of $n(F \cup V)$?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
यहाँ, फुटबल मन पराउने $n(F) = 35$, भलिबल मन पराउने $n(V) = 25$ र दुवै मन पराउने $n(F \cap V) = 10$ छन्। कम्तीमा एउटा खेल मन पराउने विद्यार्थीहरूको संख्या निकाल्न समूहको सूत्र प्रयोग गर्दा: $n(F \cup V) = n(F) + n(V) - n(F \cap V) = 35 + 25 - 10 = 50$ हुन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Here, we have $n(F) = 35$, $n(V) = 25$, and the intersection $n(F \cap V) = 10$. To find the number of students who like at least one game (the union of the sets), we use the formula: $n(F \cup V) = n(F) + n(V) - n(F \cap V)$. Substituting the values gives $35 + 25 - 10 = 50$.
Citation: Lesson 1

sub_questions.questionNepali: कुनै पनि खेल मन नपराउने विद्यार्थीहरूको संख्या पत्ता लगाउनुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the number of students who like neither game.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
कुनै पनि खेल मन नपराउने विद्यार्थीहरूको संख्या पत्ता लगाउन, जम्मा विद्यार्थी संख्या ($n(U)$) बाट कम्तीमा एउटा खेल मन पराउने विद्यार्थी संख्या ($n(F \cup V)$) घटाउनुपर्छ। तसर्थ, $n(U) - n(F \cup V) = 60 - 50 = 10$ जना।
उद्धरण: पाठ १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The number of students who like neither game corresponds to the complement of the union set. We calculate this by subtracting the number of students who like at least one game from the total number of students: $n(U) - n(F \cup V) = 60 - 50 = 10$.
Citation: Lesson 1

sub_questions.questionNepali: फुटबल मात्र मन पराउने विद्यार्थीको संख्या निकाल्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate the number of students who like football only.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
फुटबल मात्र मन पराउने विद्यार्थी संख्या ($n_0(F)$) निकाल्न, फुटबल मन पराउने जम्मा विद्यार्थीबाट दुवै खेल मन पराउने विद्यार्थी घटाउनुपर्छ। सूत्र: $n_0(F) = n(F) - n(F \cap V) = 35 - 10 = 25$ जना।
उद्धरण: पाठ १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
To find the number of students who like only football ($n_0(F)$), we subtract those who like both games from the total number of students who like football. Using the formula: $n_0(F) = n(F) - n(F \cap V) = 35 - 10 = 25$.
Citation: Lesson 1

sub_questions.questionNepali: भलिबल मात्र मन पराउने र फुटबल मात्र मन पराउने विद्यार्थीको अनुपात कति हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the ratio of students liking only volleyball to those liking only football?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
पहिले भलिबल मात्र मन पराउने विद्यार्थी निकालौँ: $n_0(V) = n(V) - n(F \cap V) = 25 - 10 = 15$। फुटबल मात्र मन पराउने संख्या २५ छ। अब अनुपात निकालौँ: $n_0(V) : n_0(F) = 15 : 25$। यसलाई ५ ले भाग गर्दा $3 : 5$ हुन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
First, calculate the number of students who like only Volleyball: $n_0(V) = 25 - 10 = 15$. We already know only Football is 25. The ratio is $15 : 25$. Simplifying this fraction by dividing both sides by 5 gives the ratio $3 : 5$.
Citation: Lesson 1

context.Nepali: श्यामले रु. ४०,००० दुई वर्षका लागि १५% वार्षिक ब्याजदरमा ऋण लियो ।
context.English: Shyam borrowed Rs. 40,000 for 2 years at 15% annual interest rate.

sub_questions.questionNepali: साधारण ब्याज पत्ता लगाउने सूत्र लेख्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write the formula to find simple interest.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
साधारण ब्याज (Simple Interest) निकाल्ने सूत्र $SI = \frac{P \times T \times R}{100}$ हो, जहाँ P सावाँ (Principal), T समय (Time) र R ब्याजदर (Rate) हो।
उद्धरण: पाठ २
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The standard formula to calculate Simple Interest is $SI = \frac{P \times T \times R}{100}$, where P represents Principal, T represents Time in years, and R represents the annual Rate of interest.
Citation: Lesson 2

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the annual compound interest.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
To find Compound Interest ($CI$), use the formula $CI = P[(1 + \frac{R}{100})^T - 1]$. Substitute the values: $40000[(1 + 0.15)^2 - 1] = 40000[1.3225 - 1] = 40000 \times 0.3225 = 12,900$. The compound interest is Rs. 12,900.
Citation: Lesson 2

sub_questions.questionNepali: चक्रीय ब्याज र साधारण ब्याजको अन्तर कति हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the difference between compound interest and simple interest?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
पहिले साधारण ब्याज निकालौँ: $SI = \frac{40000 \times 2 \times 15}{100} = 12,000$। हामीले खण्ड (ख) मा चक्रीय ब्याज रु १२,९०० निकालिसकेका छौँ। अब अन्तर निकाल्न: $CI - SI = 12,900 - 12,000 = 900$।
उद्धरण: पाठ २
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
First, calculate the Simple Interest using the formula: $SI = \frac{40000 \times 2 \times 15}{100} = 12,000$. The Compound Interest calculated in the previous step is Rs. 12,900. The difference is $12,900 - 12,000 = 900$.
Citation: Lesson 2

context.Nepali: एउटा मेसिनको हालको मूल्य रु. १,००,००० छ र यसको मूल्यमा वार्षिक १०% ह्रास आउँछ ।
context.English: The present price of a machine is Rs. 1,00,000 and it depreciates at 10% per annum.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the price after 2 years.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the compound depreciation formula $V_T = V_0(1 - \frac{R}{100})^T$ with $V_0 = 1,00,000$, $R = 10$, and $T = 2$: $V_2 = 100000(0.9)^2 = 100000 \times 0.81 = 81,000$. The price after 2 years is Rs. 81,000.
Citation: Lesson 3

sub_questions.questionNepali: कति वर्षपछि मेसिनको मूल्य रु. ७२,९०० हुनेछ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: After how many years will the price be Rs. 72,900?
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Substitute values into the depreciation formula: $72900 = 100000(0.9)^T$. Simplifying gives $0.729 = (0.9)^T$. Since we know that $0.9^3 = 0.729$, by comparing exponents, we find that time $T = 3$ years.
Citation: Lesson 3

context.Nepali: विनिमय दर: १ अमेरिकी डलर = ने.रु. १३० छ ।

sub_questions.questionNepali: ने.रु. २६,००० सँग कति डलर साट्न सकिन्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: How many dollars can be exchanged with NRs. 26,000?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
तपाईंसँग नेपाली रुपैयाँ छ र डलर साट्नु छ भने, नेपाली रुपैयाँलाई विनिमय दरले भाग गर्नुपर्छ। डलर रकम = $\frac{26000}{130} = 200$। तसर्थ, २०० डलर साट्न सकिन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ४
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
To convert Nepali Rupees to Dollars, divide the amount of NRs by the exchange rate. Dollars = $26000 / 130 = 200$. Thus, you can exchange for $200.
Citation: Lesson 4

sub_questions.questionNepali: यदि नेपाली रुपैयाँ १०% ले अधिमूल्यन भयो भने, ने.रु. २६,००० ले कति डलर साट्न सकिएला ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: If Nepali rupee is revalued by 10%, how many dollars can be exchanged with NRs. 26,000?
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
नेपाली मुद्रा अधिमूल्यन (Revaluation) हुनु भनेको डलरको भाउ घट्नु हो। नयाँ विनिमय दर = $130 - (130 \text{ को } 10\%) = 130 - 13 = 117$। अब नयाँ दरले साट्दा: $26000 / 117 \approx 222.22$ डलर।
उद्धरण: पाठ ४
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Revaluation of Nepali currency means the exchange rate decreases (NRs becomes stronger against the dollar). The new rate is $130 - 10\% = 130 - 13 = 117$. The new exchange amount is $26000 / 117 \approx 222.22$ dollars.
Citation: Lesson 4

context.Nepali: एउटा वर्ग आधार भएको पिरामिडको आधारको भुजा १० से.मि. र छड्के उचाइ १३ से.मि. छ ।
context.English: A square-based pyramid has base side 10 cm and slant height 13 cm.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the area of the base.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
पिरामिडको आधार वर्गाकार छ, त्यसैले क्षेत्रफल ($A$) निकाल्न भुजाको वर्ग ($a^2$) गरिन्छ। यहाँ भुजा $a=10$ से.मि. छ, त्यसैले $A = 10^2 = 100$ वर्ग से.मि.।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Since the pyramid has a square base, the area $A$ is calculated as the side length squared ($a^2$). Given $a = 10$ cm, the area is $10^2 = 100$ sq. cm.
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the vertical height.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
ठाडो उचाइ ($h$), छड्के उचाइ ($l$), र आधारको आधा लम्बाइ ($a/2$) बिच पाइथागोरस सम्बन्ध हुन्छ: $l^2 = h^2 + (a/2)^2$। यहाँ $l=13$ र $a/2=5$ छ। मान राख्दा: $13^2 = h^2 + 5^2 \Rightarrow 169 = h^2 + 25 \Rightarrow h^2 = 144 \Rightarrow h = 12$ से.मि.।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the Pythagorean relationship for a pyramid: $l^2 = h^2 + (a/2)^2$. With slant height $l=13$ and half-base $a/2=5$, we get $169 = h^2 + 25$. Solving for $h$, we get $h^2 = 144$, so the vertical height $h = 12$ cm.
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate the volume of the pyramid.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
पिरामिडको आयतन निकाल्ने सूत्र $V = \frac{1}{3} \times A \times h$ हो। अघिल्लो खण्डबाट $A=100$ र $h=12$ थाहा छ। मान राख्दा: $V = \frac{1}{3} \times 100 \times 12 = 100 \times 4 = 400$ घन से.मि.।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The formula for volume is $V = \frac{1}{3} \times \text{Base Area} \times \text{Height}$. Using the previously calculated values ($A=100, h=12$), we get $V = \frac{1}{3} \times 100 \times 12 = 400$ cubic cm.
Citation: Lesson 5

context.Nepali: ६ से.मि., ८ से.मि. र १० से.मि. अर्धव्यास भएका तीनवटा धातुका गोला पगालेर एउटा ठुलो गोला बनाइयो ।
context.English: Three metallic spheres of radii 6 cm, 8 cm, and 10 cm are melted to form a single large sphere.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate the total volume of all three spheres.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The volume of a sphere is $V = \frac{4}{3}\pi r^3$. The total volume is the sum of the volumes of the individual spheres: $\frac{4}{3}\pi (6^3 + 8^3 + 10^3) = \frac{4}{3}\pi (1728) = 2304\pi$ cm³.
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.questionNepali: नयाँ ठुलो गोलाको अर्धव्यास पत्ता लगाउनुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the radius of the new large sphere.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
नयाँ ठुलो गोलाको आयतन $\frac{4}{3}\pi R^3$ कुल आयतनसँग बराबर हुन्छ। अर्थात्, $\frac{4}{3}\pi R^3 = \frac{4}{3}\pi (1728)$। दुवै तर्फबाट $\frac{4}{3}\pi$ हटाउँदा, $R^3 = 1728$ हुन्छ। यसको घनमूल निकाल्दा $R = 12$ से.मि. हुन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Equating the volume of the new large sphere $\frac{4}{3}\pi R^3$ to the total volume $\frac{4}{3}\pi (1728)$, we simplify to $R^3 = 1728$. Taking the cube root, we find the radius $R = 12$ cm.
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the surface area of the new sphere.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
गोलाको सतहको क्षेत्रफलको सूत्र $A = 4\pi R^2$ हो। यहाँ $R=12$ छ। मान राख्दा: $A = 4\pi (12)^2 = 4\pi (144) = 576\pi$ वर्ग से.मि.।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The surface area formula is $A = 4\pi R^2$. Substituting $R=12$: $A = 4\pi (144) = 576\pi$ sq. cm.
Citation: Lesson 5

context.Nepali: एउटा कोठाको लम्बाइ ५ मि., चौडाइ ४ मि. र उचाइ ३ मि. छ । यसमा जम्मा १० वर्ग मि. क्षेत्रफल भएका झ्याल र ढोका छन् ।
context.English: A room is 5m x 4m x 3m. It has windows and doors with total area 10 sq. m.

sub_questions.questionNepali: झ्याल र ढोका बाहेक भित्ताको क्षेत्रफल निकाल्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the area of walls excluding windows and doors.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
पहिले कोठाको चारै भित्ताको क्षेत्रफल निकालौँ: $A = 2h(l+b) = 2(3)(5+4) = 6(9) = 54$ वर्ग मि.। अब झ्याल-ढोकाको क्षेत्रफल १० घटाउँदा: $54 - 10 = 44$ वर्ग मि.।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
First, calculate the total area of the four walls using $2h(l+b)$: $2(3)(9) = 54$ sq. m. Subtract the area of openings (10 sq. m) to get the net area: $54 - 10 = 44$ sq. m.
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.questionNepali: प्रति वर्ग मि. रु. ५० का दरले रङ लगाउन कति खर्च लाग्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the cost of painting at Rs. 50 per sq. m.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
जम्मा खर्च निकाल्न, रङ लगाउने क्षेत्रफल (४४ वर्ग मि.) लाई दर (रु. ५०) ले गुणन गर्नुपर्छ। खर्च = $44 \times 50 = 2200$।
उद्धरण: पाठ ५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
To find the total cost, multiply the net area (44 sq. m) by the rate (Rs. 50). Total Cost = $44 \times 50 = 2200$.
Citation: Lesson 5

sub_questions.questionNepali: n औं पद निकाल्ने सूत्र लेख्नुहोस् ।
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write the formula for nth term.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
अंकगणितीय श्रेणीमा कुनै पनि पद ($t_n$) निकाल्ने सूत्र $t_n = a + (n-1)d$ हो, जहाँ $a$ पहिलो पद र $d$ समान अन्तर हो।
उद्धरण: पाठ ६
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The formula for the nth term of an arithmetic progression is $t_n = a + (n-1)d$, where $a$ is the first term and $d$ is the common difference.
Citation: Lesson 6

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the 10th term.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Here, first term $a=5$ and common difference $d=5$. To find the 10th term, substitute $n=10$: $t_{10} = 5 + 9(5) = 5 + 45 = 50$.
Citation: Lesson 6

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the sum of the first 10 terms.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
योगफलको सूत्र $S_n = \frac{n}{2}(a + l)$ प्रयोग गर्न सकिन्छ किनभने हामीलाई अन्तिम पद (१० औं पद = ५०) थाहा छ। $S_{10} = \frac{10}{2}(5 + 50) = 5(55) = 275$।
उद्धरण: पाठ ६
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Since we know the last term ($l=50$), we can use the sum formula $S_n = \frac{n}{2}(a + l)$. Substituting values: $S_{10} = \frac{10}{2}(5 + 50) = 5(55) = 275$.
Citation: Lesson 6

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write the type of equation.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
यो समीकरणमा चर राशि $x$ को उच्चतम घाताङ्क २ छ, त्यसैले यो वर्ग समीकरण (Quadratic Equation) हो।
उद्धरण: पाठ ७
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Since the highest power of the variable x is 2, this is a Quadratic Equation.
Citation: Lesson 7

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the values of x.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Solve by factorization: Split $-8x$ into $-5x$ and $-3x$. Group terms: $x(x-5) - 3(x-5) = 0$, leading to $(x-5)(x-3) = 0$. The roots are $x=3$ and $x=5$.
Citation: Lesson 7

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Verify the answer.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Substitute $x=3$: $9 - 24 + 15 = 0$. Substitute $x=5$: $25 - 40 + 15 = 0$. Both solutions satisfy the original equation.
Citation: Lesson 7

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Simplify the equation.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Break down $5^{x+1}$ into $5^x \cdot 5$. Factor out $5^x$ to get $5^x(5 + 1) = 150$, which simplifies to $6 \cdot 5^x = 150$.
Citation: Lesson 9

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the value of x.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
माथिको समीकरणबाट $5^x = \frac{150}{6} = 25$ हुन्छ। २५ भनेको $5^2$ हो। आधार एउटै भएकोले घाताङ्क बराबर हुन्छ, त्यसैले $x = 2$।
उद्धरण: पाठ ९
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
From the simplified equation, divide by 6: $5^x = 25$. Since $25 = 5^2$, equating the exponents gives $x = 2$.
Citation: Lesson 9

context.Nepali: एउटा समानान्तर चतुर्भुजको क्षेत्रफल १०० वर्ग से.मि. छ । एउटै आधारमा बनेको त्रिभुज ABE छ ।
context.English: A parallelogram has area 100 sq. cm. Triangle ABE stands on the same base.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write the area relationship.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
एउटै आधार र उही समानान्तर रेखाहरू बिच बनेको त्रिभुजको क्षेत्रफल समानान्तर चतुर्भुजको क्षेत्रफलको आधा हुन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
A triangle standing on the same base and between the same parallel lines as a parallelogram has half the area of the parallelogram.
Citation: Lesson 10

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find area of triangle ABE.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
माथिको सम्बन्ध अनुसार, त्रिभुजको क्षेत्रफल = $\frac{1}{2} \times 100 = 50$ वर्ग से.मि.।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Using the relationship, Triangle Area = $\frac{1}{2} \times$ Parallelogram Area = $\frac{1}{2} \times 100 = 50$ sq. cm.
Citation: Lesson 10

context.Nepali: चक्रीय चतुर्भुज ABCD मा $\angle A = 2x$ र $\angle C = 3x$ छ ।
context.English: In cyclic quadrilateral ABCD, $\angle A = 2x$ and $\angle C = 3x$.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write the property of cyclic quadrilateral.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
चक्रीय चतुर्भुजका सम्मुख कोणहरू (Opposite Angles) सम्पूरक हुन्छन्, अर्थात् तिनीहरूको योगफल १८० डिग्री हुन्छ।
उद्धरण: पाठ १२
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The opposite angles of a cyclic quadrilateral are supplementary, meaning their sum is 180 degrees.
Citation: Lesson 12

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find value of x.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$\angle A$ र $\angle C$ सम्मुख कोण हुन्। त्यसैले, $2x + 3x = 180 \Rightarrow 5x = 180 \Rightarrow x = 36$।
उद्धरण: पाठ १२
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Since $\angle A$ and $\angle C$ are opposite angles, their sum is 180. $2x + 3x = 180 \Rightarrow 5x = 180 \Rightarrow x = 36$.
Citation: Lesson 12

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find measure of $\angle A$.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
$\angle A = 2x$ हो। $x$ को मान राख्दा: $2 \times 36 = 72^\circ$।
उद्धरण: पाठ १२
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Substitute the value of x into the expression for $\angle A$: $2(36) = 72$ degrees.
Citation: Lesson 12

context.Nepali: एउटा समबाहु त्रिभुजको क्षेत्रफल $16\sqrt{3}$ वर्ग से.मि. छ ।
context.English: The area of an equilateral triangle is $16\sqrt{3}$ sq. cm.

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write the area formula.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
समबाहु त्रिभुजको क्षेत्रफल निकाल्ने सूत्र $A = \frac{\sqrt{3}}{4} a^2$ हो।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
The formula for the area of an equilateral triangle is $A = \frac{\sqrt{3}}{4} a^2$.
Citation: Lesson 10

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Find the side length.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
क्षेत्रफलको मान सूत्रमा राख्दा: $16\sqrt{3} = \frac{\sqrt{3}}{4} a^2$। दुवै तर्फ $\sqrt{3}$ काटिन्छ। $a^2 = 16 \times 4 = 64$। त्यसैले, $a = 8$ से.मि.।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Equate the formula to the given value: $\frac{\sqrt{3}}{4} a^2 = 16\sqrt{3}$. Cancel $\sqrt{3}$ and solve for $a$: $a^2 = 64 \Rightarrow a = 8$ cm.
Citation: Lesson 10

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate the perimeter.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
समबाहु त्रिभुजको परिमिति = $3 \times$ भुजा = $3 \times 8 = 24$ से.मि.।
उद्धरण: पाठ १०
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Perimeter = $3 \times$ side length = $3 \times 8 = 24$ cm.
Citation: Lesson 10

context.Nepali: एउटा टावरको उचाइ ३० मि. छ । ३० मि. टाढाबाट हेर्दा:
context.English: A tower is 30m high. Observed from 30m away:

sub_questions.questionNepali: उन्नतांश कोण कति हुन्छ ? (शब्दमा वर्णन गर्नुहोस्)
sub_questions.questionEnglish: What is the angle of elevation? (Describe)
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
यहाँ लम्ब (Height) र आधार (Base) दुवै ३० मिटर छन्। $\tan \theta = \frac{30}{30} = 1$। हामीलाई थाहा छ $\tan 45^\circ = 1$, त्यसैले उन्नतांश कोण $45^\circ$ हो।
उद्धरण: पाठ १५
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Since Height = Base = 30m, $\tan \theta = 1$. The angle with tangent 1 is $45^\circ$, so the angle of elevation is $45^\circ$.
Citation: Lesson 15

sub_questions.questionNepali: यदि कोण $30^\circ$ बनाउनु छ भने कति टाढा जानुपर्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: How far to move for $30^\circ$ angle?
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
For $30^\circ$, new distance $d = 30 / \tan 30 = 30\sqrt{3} \approx 51.96$m. Since the observer is already at 30m, they need to move $51.96 - 30 = 21.96$ m further back.
Citation: Lesson 15

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Write median formula.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
व्यक्तिगत श्रेणीमा मध्यिकाको स्थान निकाल्ने सूत्र $\frac{N+1}{2}$ औं पद हो।
उद्धरण: पाठ १३
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
For individual series, the median is the value at the $\frac{N+1}{2}$-th position.
Citation: Lesson 13

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate Q1.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
First, sort the data: 10, 11, 12, 13, 14, 14, 15, 16, 22, 25, 27. With $N=11$, the position of $Q_1$ is $\frac{11+1}{4} = 3$rd item. The 3rd value is 12.
Citation: Lesson 13

sub_questions.questionEnglish: Calculate Quartile Deviation.
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Find $Q_3$: Position is $3 \times 3 = 9$th item, which is 22. Quartile Deviation = $\frac{Q_3 - Q_1}{2} = \frac{22 - 12}{2} = 5$.
Citation: Lesson 13

sub_questions.questionEnglish: List the sample space outcomes.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
सिक्का ३ पटक उचाल्दा जम्मा $2^3=8$ परिणामहरू हुन्छन्: {HHH, HHT, HTH, HTT, THH, THT, TTH, TTT}।
उद्धरण: पाठ १४
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
There are $2^3=8$ total outcomes: {HHH, HHT, HTH, HTT, THH, THT, TTH, TTT}.
Citation: Lesson 14
sub_questions.answerNepali: {HHH, HHT, HTH, HTT, THH, THT, TTH, TTT}
sub_questions.answerEnglish: {HHH, HHT, HTH, HTT, THH, THT, TTH, TTT}

sub_questions.questionNepali: कम्तीमा २ टाउको आउने सम्भाव्यता कति हुन्छ ?
sub_questions.questionEnglish: Probability of at least 2 heads.
sub_questions.explanationNepali:
कम्तीमा २ टाउको (Heads) भएका परिणामहरू: {HHH, HHT, HTH, THH} (जम्मा ४ वटा)। सम्भाव्यता = $\frac{\text{अनुकूल परिणाम}}{\text{जम्मा परिणाम}} = \frac{4}{8} = \frac{1}{2}$।
उद्धरण: पाठ १४
sub_questions.explanationEnglish:
Outcomes with at least 2 Heads are {HHH, HHT, HTH, THH} (Count = 4). Probability = $4/8 = 1/2$.
Citation: Lesson 14
